TopicTitle: sas and rcs won't stay on.

Articles.Content:
I did a full reinstall from my KSP and re-added the mods. Now SAS and RCS disable them-self after 2 sec.

mods dir:


000_Toolbar
000_USITools
ActiveTextureManagement
AmpYear
BoulderCo
BoxSat alpha
Chatterer
CollisionFX
CommunityResourcePack
CommunityTechTree
ConnectedLivingSpace
ContractsWindow
CrossFeedEnabler
DistantObject
DMagicOrbitalScience
EnhancedNavBall

FerramAerospaceResearch
Firespitter
Hydrogen NTRs
KerbalEngineer

ModuleRCSFX
NASAmission

NearFutureProps
NearFuturePropulsion
NearFutureSolar

ProceduralFairings
Regolith

SCANsat
ScienceAlert
SmartParts
Squad

ThunderAerospace
Trajectories
TriggerTech
UmbraSpaceIndustries
UniversalStorage

Edited March 30, 2015 by thomas15v

Looking at this:

[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: RCS - disabled.
[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: SAS - disabled.

'AY' is turning them off.

Looking at your mod list, I would suspect AmpYear. Does it have a feature that automatically turns SAS/RCS off when electricity is low to save power maybe?

D.

Looking at this:

[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: RCS - disabled.
[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: SAS - disabled.

'AY' is turning them off.

Looking at your mod list, I would suspect AmpYear. Does it have a feature that automatically turns SAS/RCS off when electricity is low to save power maybe?

D.

Ty . Found it. I needed to enable the manager otherwise it disables everything that uses power

Edited March 30, 2015 by thomas15v

Looking at this:

[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: RCS - disabled.
[LOG 15:23:05.336] AY.AYController[FFF93806][650.04]: SAS - disabled.

'AY' is turning them off.

Looking at your mod list, I would suspect AmpYear. Does it have a feature that automatically turns SAS/RCS off when electricity is low to save power maybe?

D.

Oh man, thank you! Just installed AY and started playing with it, didn't think about it disabling my SAS. Really saved my bacon there.
